name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-zpl-viewer
title: ZPL Viewer
shortDescription: This web part will allow a user to select a text file contatining zpl which is used to generate an image using the labelary web service to render the zpl and return the image.
longDescription: This web part will allow a user to select a text file contatining zpl which is used to generate an image using the labelary web service to render the zpl and return the image.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
